author: makortel
body:
Migrate HLTTauDQMOfflineSource to DQMEDAnalyzer. I split the old histogram booking to two parts: the HLT menu parsing that is done in dqmBeginRun() (now that it gets called before bookHistograms()), and the booking of histograms that is done in bookHistograms().

FYI @mbluj
title: Migrate Tau HLT DQM to DQMEDAnalyzer
